tutorial_house.transcript:
Build yourself a house!
A house requires a roof, body and a door.

inventory.name: item1
inventory.description: An item used to build your house

inventory.name: item2
inventory.description: An item used to build your house

inventory.name: item3
inventory.description: An item used to build your house

hints: Every house requires a base, body, and roof.
Try adding in decorations. Try the class 'window'!

town_hall.transcript: If we're going to make this town, we're going to need a town hall!
hints: A town hall needs to be large enough to accommodate all of the residents
As the centre piece of our town, we should make the town hall special in some way.
